comments: Tests covering the single shard changelog stream query smoke cases.

tests.name: append-only left all join changelog(table)(partial primary join)
tests.description: append-only left all join changelog(table)(partial primary join)

statements.query: drop stream if exists test14_append_stream1_1
drop stream if exists test14_append_stream2_1
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream1_1 (i int, k1 int, k2 string)
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream2_1 (j int, kk1 int, kk2 string)
select a.i, a.k1, a.k2, b.j, b.kk1, b.kk2, _tp_delta from test14_append_stream1_1 as a  left all join changelog(test14_append_stream2_1, kk1, kk2) as b on a.k1 = b.kk1
insert into test14_append_stream2_1(j, kk1, kk2) values (2, 1, 'kk')
insert into test14_append_stream1_1(i, k1, k2) values (1, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream2_1(j, kk1, kk2) values (4, 1, 'kk2')
insert into test14_append_stream2_1(j, kk1, kk2) values (4, 1, 'kk')
insert into test14_append_stream1_1(i, k1, k2) values (3, 2, 'k')

tests.description: append-only left all join changelog(table)(no primary join)

statements.query: drop stream if exists test14_append_stream1_1
drop stream if exists test14_append_stream2_1
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream1_1 (i int, k1 int, k2 string)
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream2_1 (j int, kk1 int, kk2 string)
select a.i, a.k1, a.k2, b.j, b.kk1, b.kk2, _tp_delta from test14_append_stream1_1 as a left all join changelog(test14_append_stream2_1, kk1, kk2) as b on a.i = b.j
insert into test14_append_stream2_1(j, kk1, kk2) values (1, 2, 'k2')
insert into test14_append_stream1_1(i, k1, k2) values (1, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream2_1(j, kk1, kk2) values (2, 2, 'k2')
insert into test14_append_stream1_1(i, k1, k2) values (3, 1, 'k')

tests.description: append-only inner all join changelog_kv(all primary join)

statements.query: drop stream if exists test14_append_stream1_1
drop stream if exists test14_append_stream2_1
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream1_1 (i int, k1 int, k2 string)
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream2_1 (j int, kk1 int, kk2 string) primary key (kk1, kk2) settings mode='changelog_kv'
select a.i, a.k1, a.k2, b.j, b.kk1, b.kk2 from test14_append_stream1_1 as a inner all join test14_append_stream2_1 as b on a.k1 = b.kk1 and a.k2 = b.kk2
insert into test14_append_stream2_1(j, kk1, kk2) values (2, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream1_1(i, k1, k2) values (1, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream2_1(j, kk1, kk2, _tp_delta) values (2, 1, 'k', -1)
insert into test14_append_stream1_1(i, k1, k2) values (3, 1, 'k')

statements.query: drop stream if exists test14_append_stream1_1
drop stream if exists test14_append_stream2_1
drop stream if exists test14_append_stream3_1
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream1_1 (i int, k1 int, k2 string) settings mode='changelog'
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream2_1 (j int, kk1 int, kk2 string) settings mode='changelog'
create stream if not exists test14_append_stream3_1 (k int, kkk1 int, kkk2 string) settings mode='changelog'

select a.i, a.k1, a.k2, b.j, b.kk1, b.kk2, c.k, c.kkk1, c.kkk2, _tp_delta from test14_append_stream1_1 as a inner all join test14_append_stream2_1 as b on a.k1 = b.kk1 and a.k2 = b.kk2 inner all join test14_append_stream3_1 as c on a.k1 = c.kkk1 and a.k2 = c.kkk2
insert into test14_append_stream1_1(i, k1, k2) values (1, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream2_1(j, kk1, kk2) values (2, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream3_1(k, kkk1, kkk2) values (3, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream2_1(j, kk1, kk2, _tp_delta) values (2, 1, 'k', -1)
insert into test14_append_stream1_1(i, k1, k2) values (4, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream3_1(k, kkk1, kkk2) values (5, 1, 'k')
insert into test14_append_stream2_1(j, kk1, kk2) values (6, 1, 'k')
